title: Not only to save our jobs
creator_contributor_role: Victoria. Education Dept. Curriculum Branch, production company
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Conflict management
Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Negotiation
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Conflict management
description: Shows how a group of people at a small Melbourne manufacturing company acted to overcome the threat of losing their jobs by setting up a new form of organisation based on worker participation in ownership and decision-making. The effects on employees' attitudes and work relationships are shown.
